name: Enquiquineur
description:
Pesky Player

A simple task, an annoying other player. You’re not alone, but wish you were! (Or do you?)

(This is a very simple game/prototype as I discovered the game jam near the end and started late because of my partaking in Mini Jam 113, but I thought the idea was worth a try!)

Made with Love2D.

Controls
  • Arrow keys to move
  • Mouse to light up the scenery and click on the PAUSE button
  • If you lose, you just have to close the application and relaunch if you want to try again.

Made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 with theme ‘You’re not alone’. (Running time: from August 21st 2022 at 12:00 PM to August 28th 2022 at 12:00 PM.)

I also made a navigator version, but at the very last second and could almost publish it… Sorry for those that cannot play the (only) Windows version.
